title: Calories in 10 McNuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 10 mcnuggets from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, breaded and fried; no dipping sauce included; values based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size. Check McDonald's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: 10 McNuggets provide about 410 kcal and 22 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one McNugget?
What is the protein in 10 mcnuggets?

faqs.a: Yes, 10 mcnuggets have around 897 mg sodium.
Typically 0 g trans fat in standard preparation.

faqs.q: How do sauces affect calories in 10 mcnuggets?
faqs.a: One sauce packet adds 45-100 kcal depending on type.
